01 - A quick introduction to git

Posted on February 27, 2018

We are facing a reproducibility crisis in Computational Biology and Theoretical Biology. A key tool to make scientific research reproducible, allow cooperative work on files and versioning of resources are version control systems. This talks will give a short introduction to git, a free and open source distributed version control... [Read More]
